## VFS.unmount() method

Unmounts a VFS from the specified path.

Behavior: - Removes the mount record. - If the mount directory was auto-created by this VFS and `cleanupOnUnmount` is true, it will be removed only if it is still empty.

**Signature:**

```typescript
unmount(path: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

path


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The path to unmount


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

True if a VFS was unmounted, false otherwise
